topic:
请帮我分析如下ctf题目 : from Crypto.Util.number import *
 from shin import flag
 m=bytes_to_long(b'flag.encode()')
 e=65537
 p=getPrime(256)
 q=getPrime(512)
 r=getPrime(512)
 n=p*q*r
 P=pow(p,2,n)
 Q=pow(q,2,n)
 c=pow(m,e,n)
 print(f"P = {P}")
 print(f"Q = {Q}")
 print(f"n = {n}")
 print(f"c = {c}")
